shortdesc.ph: Sets an SDK preset voice beautifier effect.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.p: Call this method to set an SDK preset voice beautifier effect for the local user who sends an audio stream. After setting an audio effect, all users in the channel can hear the effect. You can set different audio effects for different scenarios. See Set the Voice Beautifier and Audio Effects.
For better vocal effects, Agora recommends that you set scenario to (3) and set profile to (4) or (5) before calling this method.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Please do not set the profile parameter to (1) or (6), otherwise the method will not take effect.
This method works best with the human voice. Agora does not recommend using this method for audio containing music.
After calling this method, Agora recommends not calling the following methods, because they can override \ref IRtcEngine::setVoiceBeautifierPreset "setVoiceBeautifierPreset":

plentry.pd: The options for SDK preset voice beautifier effects.
